statements.select: select a.advertise_id ,a.advertise_name ,a.advertise_code ,a.file_size ,a.file_format ,a.display ,a.playback_time ,a.url_address ,a.brand_customer_id ,a.brand_id ,a.status ,a.create_time ,a.create_user_id ,a.modify_time ,a.modify_user_id ,a.customer_id ,b.id advertise_order_advertise_id From T_Advertise a
inner join T_Advertise_Order_Advertise b on(a.advertise_id = b.advertise_id) where 1=1 and 1=1 and b.order_id=#OrderId#;
